onboarding_steps.title: Welcome to the University of Mannheim!
onboarding_steps.description: We are excited to have you join our team as a Machine Learning Professor in the Data Science department. This onboarding material will guide you through the necessary steps to get started.
tasks: Read the welcome message from the Department of Equal Opportunity and Social Diversity.

Familiarize yourself with the location of your office (B 6, 30–32 – Room 013) and the contact information of Natalie Rose, the contact person for the Department of Equal Opportunity and Social Diversity.
Contact Natalie Rose (Phone: +49 621 181-2534, E-mail: natalie.embach-deegmail-uni-mannheim.de) to introduce yourself and schedule a meeting to discuss any questions or concerns you may have.

onboarding_steps.title: Important Information for New Staff Members
onboarding_steps.description: As a new staff member, it is important to familiarize yourself with the policies and procedures of the University of Mannheim. This will ensure a smooth transition into your role.
tasks: Review the information provided on the University of Mannheim's Human Resources website.
Read the employment conditions and benefits for staff members.

onboarding_steps.title: Department-specific Information
onboarding_steps.description: As a Machine Learning Professor in the Data Science department, there are specific resources and information that will be relevant to your role.
tasks: Explore the Master's program in Data Science offered by the University of Mannheim.
Review the curriculum and courses offered in the Data Science program.

onboarding_steps.title: Professional Development Opportunities
onboarding_steps.description: At the University of Mannheim, we value continuous learning and professional development. Here are some resources and opportunities available to support your growth.
tasks: Explore the doctoral programs offered by the University of Mannheim.
Consider joining the Data Science doctoral program to further enhance your expertise.
